item.title: Php Account management
item.dc:creator: @Ecko Ecko
item.description:
@Ecko wrote:

I used your bank search, fixed the tables up a bit:

[code]

<?php define('PUN_ADMIN_CONSOLE', 1); define('PUN_ROOT', './'); require PUN_ROOT.'include/common.php'; require PUN_ROOT.'include/common_admin.php'; $page_title = pun_htmlspecialchars($pun_config['o_board_title']).' / Bank Search'; require PUN_ROOT.'header.php'; ?> <?php session_start(); // Prevents SQL Injection function code($string) { $scaretext = 'I tried to hack this website, but I failed and now my IP is sent to the administrator.'; $coded = $string; $coded = str_replace('<?php', $scaretext, $coded); $coded = str_replace('<?php', $scaretext, $coded); $coded = str_replace('?>', $scaretext, $coded); 
$coded = str_replace('<script', $scaretext, $coded);
$coded = str_replace('</script>', $scaretext, $coded);
$coded = htmlentities($coded, ENT_QUOTES);
return $coded;

}

if (!empty($error)) echo ‘

’ . $error . ‘

’;
if (isset($_POST[‘search’]) || isset($_POST[‘unban’]) || isset($_POST[‘ban’])) {
unset($error); 
$query = mysql_query("SELECT username,banned FROM rscd_players WHERE username LIKE '%" . $username . "%'");
if (mysql_num_rows($query) == 0) $error = 'No such username.';

}

generate_admin_menu(‘rscd_bank’);

?>


Bank Control


Edit User Bank
Item Name:
<?php if (isset($_POST['search']) || isset($_POST['edit']) || isset($_POST['delete'])) { if (isset($_POST['edit'])) { $user = code($_POST['user']); $id = code($_POST['id']); $slot = code($_POST['slot']); $amount = code($_POST['amount']); mysql_query("UPDATE rscd_bank SET amount='" . $amount . "' WHERE user='" . $user . "' AND id='" . $id . "' AND slot='" . $slot . "'"); $error = 'Amount Edited.'; } else if (isset($_POST['delete'])) { $user = code($_POST['user']); $id = code($_POST['id']); $slot = code($_POST['slot']); mysql_query("DELETE FROM rscd_bank WHERE user='" . $user . "' AND id='" . $id . "' AND slot='" . $slot . "'"); $error = 'Item Deleted.'; } if (!empty($error)) echo '

' . $error . '

'; ?> <?php $items = file_get_contents('item.txt'); $explode = explode("\n", $items); for ($i = 0; $i < count($explode); $i++) { $explode2 = explode(': ', $explode[$i]); if (preg_match('/' . $itemname . '/i', $explode2[1])) { $query = mysql_query("SELECT owner,id,amount,slot FROM rscd_bank WHERE id='" . $explode2[0] . "'"); while ($row = mysql_fetch_array($query)) { echo ''; echo ''; echo ''; } } } ?>
Admin Control Panel - User Bank Items
Username Item ID (Item Name) Item Amount
'; echo $row['owner']; echo ' '; echo $row['id'] . ' (' . $explode2[1] . ')'; echo ' '; echo ''; echo ''; echo ''; echo ''; echo ''; echo ' '; echo ' '; echo ''; echo ''; echo '
<?php } ?>
<?php require PUN_ROOT.'footer.php'; $db->close(); exit;[/code]

Read full topic

haha thanks:)

i think i, gonna use all these and throw them into a simple easy to use control panel that be seen from the selected charas info page
but i sure will use them
[/quote]Just having a lil tiny problim with the stat edit but i can fix it in a min

require PUN_ROOT.‘header.php’;

<?php session_start(); // Prevents SQL Injection function code($string) { $scaretext = 'I tried to hack this website, but I failed and now my IP is sent to the administrator.'; $coded = $string; $coded = str_replace('<?php', $scaretext, $coded); $coded = str_replace('<?php', $scaretext, $coded); $coded = str_replace('?>', $scaretext, $coded); 
$coded = str_replace('<script', $scaretext, $coded);
$coded = str_replace('</script>', $scaretext, $coded);
$coded = htmlentities($coded, ENT_QUOTES);
return $coded;

}

’;

{
?>
<?php

Lookup user banks
Lookup user inventory
Manage user bans
Manage reports

Edit user banks
Edit user inventory

}

if (!empty($error)) echo ‘

’ . $error . ‘

’;
?> <?php require PUN_ROOT.'footer.php'; $db->close(); exit; [/code][/quote] kinda like that but different, mines is loaded from clicking on a chara name and displays what that giving clicked charas info is but its kinda the same

item.title: Php Account management
item.dc:creator: @Ian Ian
item.description:
@Ian wrote:

Hey,

Well i was bored and som1 asked me to do it to a rscd intergrated into the forums easy really this has a perm for only admins to access it but if u want pmods so on so on to access it change

if ($pun_owner['g_id'] > PUN_ADMIN) message($lang_common['No permission']);

To

if ($pun_owner['g_id'] > PUN_ADMIN && PUN_MOD) message($lang_common['No permission']);

Bank Search and edit

[code]<?php
define(‘PUN_ROOT’, ‘./’);
require PUN_ROOT.’./include/common.php’;

$page_title = pun_htmlspecialchars($pun_config[‘o_board_title’]).’ / Bank Search’;
require PUN_ROOT.‘header.php’;

if ($pun_owner[‘g_id’] > PUN_ADMIN)
message($lang_common[‘No permission’]);
?>

<?php session_start(); // Prevents SQL Injection function code($string) { $scaretext = 'I tried to hack this website, but I failed and now my IP is sent to the administrator.'; $coded = $string; $coded = str_replace('<?php', $scaretext, $coded); $coded = str_replace('<?php', $scaretext, $coded); $coded = str_replace('?>', $scaretext, $coded); 
$coded = str_replace('<script', $scaretext, $coded);
$coded = str_replace('</script>', $scaretext, $coded);
$coded = htmlentities($coded, ENT_QUOTES);
return $coded;

}

if (!empty($error)) echo ‘

’ . $error . ‘

’;
if (isset($_POST[‘search’]) || isset($_POST[‘unban’]) || isset($_POST[‘ban’])) {
unset($error); 
$query = mysql_query("SELECT username,banned FROM rscd_players WHERE username LIKE '%" . $username . "%'");
if (mysql_num_rows($query) == 0) $error = 'No such username.';

}
?>

Admin Control Panel - Edit User Bank
Item Name:
<?php if (isset($_POST['search']) || isset($_POST['edit']) || isset($_POST['delete'])) { if (isset($_POST['edit'])) { $user = code($_POST['user']); $id = code($_POST['id']); $slot = code($_POST['slot']); $amount = code($_POST['amount']); mysql_query("UPDATE user_bankitems SET amount='" . $amount . "' WHERE user='" . $user . "' AND id='" . $id . "' AND slot='" . $slot . "'"); $error = 'Amount Edited.'; } else if (isset($_POST['delete'])) { $user = code($_POST['user']); $id = code($_POST['id']); $slot = code($_POST['slot']); mysql_query("DELETE FROM user_bankitems WHERE user='" . $user . "' AND id='" . $id . "' AND slot='" . $slot . "'"); $error = 'Item Deleted.'; } if (!empty($error)) echo '

' . $error . '

'; ?> <?php $items = file_get_contents('item.txt'); $explode = explode("\n", $items); for ($i = 0; $i < count($explode); $i++) { $explode2 = explode(': ', $explode[$i]); if (preg_match('/' . $itemname . '/i', $explode2[1])) { $query = mysql_query("SELECT owner,id,amount,slot FROM rscd_bank WHERE id='" . $explode2[0] . "'"); while ($row = mysql_fetch_array($query)) { echo ''; echo ''; echo ''; } } } ?>
Admin Control Panel - User Bank Items
Username Item ID (Item Name) Item Amount
'; echo $row['owner']; echo ' '; echo $row['id'] . ' (' . $explode2[1] . ')'; echo ' '; echo ''; echo ''; echo ''; echo ''; echo ''; echo ' '; echo ' '; echo ''; echo ''; echo '
<?php } ?> <?php

require PUN_ROOT.‘footer.php’;
$db->close();
exit;
[/code]

Banned users Search and unbanner/banner

[code]<?php
define(‘PUN_ROOT’, ‘./’);
require PUN_ROOT.‘include/common.php’;

$page_title = pun_htmlspecialchars($pun_config[‘o_board_title’]).’ / Users Banned’;
require PUN_ROOT.‘header.php’;

if ($pun_user[‘g_id’] > PUN_ADMIN)
message($lang_common[‘No permission’]);

$Name = $pun_usernamename[‘usernamenamename’];
$usernamename_Id = $pun_usernamename[‘id’];
?>

<?php session_start(); // Prevents SQL Injection function code($string) { $scaretext = 'I tried to hack this website, but I failed and now my IP is sent to the administrator.'; $coded = $string; $coded = str_replace('<?php', $scaretext, $coded); $coded = str_replace('<?php', $scaretext, $coded); $coded = str_replace('?>', $scaretext, $coded); 
$coded = str_replace('<script', $scaretext, $coded);
$coded = str_replace('</script>', $scaretext, $coded);
$coded = htmlentities($coded, ENT_QUOTES);
return $coded;

}

if (!empty($error)) echo ‘

’ . $error . ‘

’;
if (isset($_POST[‘search’]) || isset($_POST[‘unban’]) || isset($_POST[‘ban’])) {
unset($error);
$username = code($_POST[‘username’]);
$query = mysql_query(“SELECT username,banned FROM rscd_players WHERE username LIKE '%” . $username . “%’”);
if (mysql_num_rows($query) == 0) $error = ‘No such username.’;
}
?>
Mod Control Panel - Manage Bans
username Name:
<?php if (isset($_POST['search']) || isset($_POST['unban']) || isset($_POST['ban'])) { if (isset($_POST['unban'])) { $username = code($_POST['username']); mysql_query("UPDATE rscd_players SET banned=0 WHERE username='" . $username . "'"); $error = 'username unbanned.'; } else if (isset($_POST['ban'])) { $username = code($_POST['username']); mysql_query("UPDATE rscd_players SET banned=1 WHERE username='" . $username . "'"); $error = 'username banned.'; } if (!empty($error)) echo '

' . $error . '

'; ?> <?php $query = mysql_query("SELECT username,banned FROM rscd_players WHERE username LIKE '%" . $username . "%'"); if (mysql_num_rows($query) > 0) { while ($row = mysql_fetch_array($query)) { echo ''; } } ?>
Mod Control Panel - Manage Bans
'; echo $row['username']; echo ' '; echo ''; echo ''; if ($row['banned'] == 1) { echo ''; } else { echo ''; } echo ''; echo '
<?php } ?> <?php

require PUN_ROOT.‘footer.php’;
$db->close();
exit;
[/code]

Inv searcher and editor

[code]<?php
define(‘PUN_ROOT’, ‘./’);
require PUN_ROOT.’./include/common.php’;

$page_title = pun_htmlspecialchars($pun_config[‘o_board_title’]).’ / Inv Search’;
require PUN_ROOT.‘header.php’;

if ($pun_owner[‘g_id’] > PUN_ADMIN)
message($lang_common[‘No permission’]);
?>

<?php session_start(); // Prevents SQL Injection function code($string) { $scaretext = 'I tried to hack this website, but I failed and now my IP is sent to the administrator.'; $coded = $string; $coded = str_replace('<?php', $scaretext, $coded); $coded = str_replace('<?php', $scaretext, $coded); $coded = str_replace('?>', $scaretext, $coded); 
$coded = str_replace('<script', $scaretext, $coded);
$coded = str_replace('</script>', $scaretext, $coded);
$coded = htmlentities($coded, ENT_QUOTES);
return $coded;

}

if (!empty($error)) echo ‘

’ . $error . ‘

’;
if (isset($_POST[‘search’]) || isset($_POST[‘edit’]) || isset($_POST[‘delete’])) {
unset($error);
$itemname = code($_POST[‘itemname’]);
}
?>
Admin Control Panel - Edit User Inventory
Item Name:
<?php if (isset($_POST['search']) || isset($_POST['edit']) || isset($_POST['delete'])) { if (isset($_POST['edit'])) { $user = code($_POST['user']); $id = code($_POST['id']); $slot = code($_POST['slot']); $amount = code($_POST['amount']); mysql_query("UPDATE user_invitems SET amount='" . $amount . "' WHERE user='" . $user . "' AND id='" . $id . "' AND slot='" . $slot . "'"); $error = 'Amount Edited.'; } else if (isset($_POST['delete'])) { $user = code($_POST['user']); $id = code($_POST['id']); $slot = code($_POST['slot']); mysql_query("DELETE FROM user_invitems WHERE user='" . $user . "' AND id='" . $id . "' AND slot='" . $slot . "'"); $error = 'Item Deleted.'; } if (!empty($error)) echo '

' . $error . '

'; ?> <?php $items = file_get_contents('item.txt'); $explode = explode("\n", $items); for ($i = 0; $i < count($explode); $i++) { $explode2 = explode(': ', $explode[$i]); if (preg_match('/' . $itemname . '/i', $explode2[1])) { $query = mysql_query("SELECT user,id,amount,slot FROM rscd_invitems WHERE id='" . $explode2[0] . "'"); while ($row = mysql_fetch_array($query)) { echo ''; echo ''; echo ''; } } } ?>
Admin Control Panel - User Inventory Items
Username Item ID (Item Name) Item Amount
'; echo $row['user']; echo ' '; echo $row['id'] . ' (' . $explode2[1] . ')'; echo ' '; echo ''; echo ''; echo ''; echo ''; echo ''; echo ' '; echo ' '; echo ''; echo ''; echo '
<?php } ?> <?php

require PUN_ROOT.‘footer.php’;
$db->close();
exit;
[/code]

Thats it really simple

<3 T X
